metadata.title: CVE-2024-24980 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Protection mechanism failure in some 3rd, 4th, and 5th Generation Intel(R)Xeon(R) Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enableescalation of privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24980` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240813.0ubuntu0.22.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240813.0ubuntu0.22.04.2').
